summary:
You ever browse on youtube to find the easiest or only way to smith/enchant/make godly items? (you know the tedious task that required for you to create 4 different parts of items and make potion, etc) well, don\'t worry, this ring(s)/potion will help you just that.

descriptionHtml:
You ever browse on youtube to find the easiest or only way to smith/enchant/make godly items? (you know the tedious task that required for you to create 4 different parts of items and make potion, etc) well, don\'t worry, this ring(s)/potion will help you just that.

So here how it works, instead of equipping 4 different items that give out bonus of 30% to smithing and drinking potion that give 30%, you only need to equip one ring and no more tedious task of getting leathers or junk equipment to enchant them first. (this is only an example btw) - (you still need steel perk etc to smith them better value than 250%).

[u]This mod include:[/u]
-ring/amulet that provide better smithing or alchemy.
-a potion for enchanting.
-a list of magical items that helps you to disenchant them earlier. Yes i know i don\'t have all of the list and yes it is kinda cheating, well, this is cheating category so.. live with it. I will add more items to list if people request them.

In theory, you can expand this further if you wish but i never actually try it.

WARNING: PLEASE TRY THIS MOD FIRST IN SEPARATE SAVE BEFORE YOU ACTUALLY USING IT WITH YOUR MAIN CHAR. I WILL NOT HELD RESPONSIBLE IF it DAMAGE YOUR SAVE. ALSO, TAKING ALL ITEMS MIGHT OVERWEIGHT YOUR CHAR THUS YOU CAN\'T RUN.

Location of items:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fkhxrSKo5WI

[u]Update log:[/u]

[u]0.4:[/u]
-)added more enchantment items such as:
A)absorb magicka/stamina/health.
B)glove of pugilist(unarm bonus).
C)Dark brotherhood sets. I added for people who to lazy to kill that old lady, etc.

[u]0.3:[/u]
-)added weapon enchantment(paralyze & soul trap).
-)added 100 gold ring/necklace, 100 black soul gem.
-)added resist magic enchantment in form of necklace or ring(i forgot).
author: Balistaus
